tasks.name: Summary
tasks.description: Summary

tasks.name: Q1
tasks.description: 1. I am able to explain what it means to be a Singaporean.

tasks.name: Q2
tasks.description: 2. I have a sense of responsibility towards Singapore.

tasks.name: Q3
tasks.description: 3. I am able to suggest ways to help in my home, community and country.

tasks.name: Q4
tasks.description: 4. I believe it is important to actively participate in school and community programmes.

tasks.name: Q5
tasks.description: 5. I know how issues around the world can affect Singapore.

tasks.name: Q6
tasks.description: 6. I am aware of global issues (e.g., inequalities, global warming, food and water security).

tasks.name: Q7
tasks.description: 7. I am able to accept the customs and practices of people from different social, cultural and religious backgrounds.

tasks.name: Q8
tasks.description: 8. I am respectful towards others who are different from me.

tasks.name: Q9
tasks.description: 9. I am able to generate ideas and explore different ways to respond to challenges.

tasks.name: Q10
tasks.description: 10. I am able to look at an issue from different perspectives.

tasks.name: Q11
tasks.description: 11. I am able to make decisions based on careful analyses of relevant information.

tasks.name: Q12
tasks.description: 12. I am able to reflect on my thoughts, attitude and actions during learning experiences.

tasks.name: Q13
tasks.description: 13. I am able to identify key areas of work in a complex task.

tasks.name: Q14
tasks.description: 14. I am able to accept perspectives that are different from me.

tasks.name: Q15
tasks.description: 15. I am able to communicate information and ideas clearly.

tasks.name: Q16
tasks.description: 16. I am able to work well in a group and contribute effectively with my members to achieve common goals.

tasks.name: Q17
tasks.description: 17. I am able to interact with others to build new knowledge, understanding and ideas.

tasks.name: Q18
tasks.description: 18. I am able to search and organise information on the internet.

tasks.name: Q19
tasks.description: 19. I understand and abide by the laws and rules (e.g., copyright) when using digital information.

tasks.name: Q20
tasks.description: 20. I am able to verify the accuracy, credibility and currency of a piece of information.

tasks.name: Q21
tasks.description: 21. I am able to determine the type of information I should or should not share online (e.g., personal and confidential information).

tasks.name: Q22
tasks.description: 22. I share digital information responsibly as part of practising cyber wellness.

tasks.name: Q23
tasks.description: 23. I am able to exchange digital information with others concurrently (e.g., working on Google Doc at the same time) and at different times  (e.g., replying messages and emails).

tasks.name: Q24
tasks.description: 24. I am able to use different media elements (e.g., text, images, audio, video) to convey my message effectively to my audience.
